definition: on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
to harmonize/to reconcile/to blend/to suit well/to adjust/to regulate/to season (food)/to provoke/to incite
to transfer/to move (troops or cadres)/to investigate/to enquire into/accent/view/argument/key (in music)/mode (music)/tune/tone/melody

sentences.english: Farmers are revolting over a new sliding-scale increase in export taxes.
sentences.chinese: 農場主對新出臺的出口稅率浮動上調政策非常不滿。

sentences.english: Raise your financial estimates, twice. Then miss them, twice.
sentences.chinese: 兩次上調財務預測，然後兩次失算。

sentences.english: Total sleep deprivation up-regulates the expression of SP.
sentences.chinese: 完全性睡眠剝奪後SP表達上調。

sentences.english: High-end rental rates likely to increase.
sentences.chinese: 北京豪華房出租價格可能會上調。

sentences.english: Netflix was raised to “buy” from “underperform” at Bank of America Corp.
sentences.chinese: 美國銀行把奈飛公司股票評級從減持上調爲買入。

sentences.english: Some predict that rising interest rates will make fixed-rate paper increasingly unattractive for investors.
sentences.chinese: 一些人預計由於利率的上調，債券將風光不在。

sentences.english: The up-regulation persisted for more than 6 months.
sentences.chinese: 這種上調能持續6個多月。

sentences.english: The stock was also upgraded to “conviction buy” from “buy” at Goldman Sachs.
sentences.chinese: 高盛集團也把西門子股票評級從買入上調爲強勢買入。

sentences.english: Atorvastatin up-regulation the expression of pcsk9.
sentences.chinese: 阿託伐他汀能上調pcsk9的表達。

sentences.english: S. fast food giant McDonald"s Corp said on Tuesday it would give its Chinese employees their first across-the-board pay rise."
sentences.chinese: 這是麥當勞進入中國內地以來首次全面上調員工工資。

sentences.english: Current pet chip price shock rise.
sentences.chinese: 目前聚酯切片價格震盪上調。

sentences.english: The ratings improvement is quite normal.
sentences.chinese: 王漢表示，“此次上調評級非常正常。

sentences.english: This up-regulation is independent of denovo protein synthesis.
sentences.chinese: 這種上調不依賴於蛋白質的重新合成。

sentences.english: Many card issuers are raising late fees and other charges.
sentences.chinese: 許多信用卡發行機構上調了滯納金和其他收費。

sentences.english: In addition, the relevant department previously said plan raise profit ratio over scholars from renmin.
sentences.chinese: 此外，有關部門此前表示計劃上調央企上繳利潤比例。

sentences.english: MNU time-dependently up-regulated the expression of c-jun and c-fos genes.
sentences.chinese: MNU可時間依賴性地上調即早基因的表達。
